verses.verse: וִיהוֹרָ֣ם <S%H3088><s%> Now Jehoram בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַחְאָ֗ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab מָלַ֤ךְ <S%H4427><s%> began to reign עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel בְּשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> in Samaria בִּשְׁנַת֙ <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁמֹנֶ֣ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֔ה <S%H6240><s%> teen לִיהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <S%H3092><s%> of Jehoshaphat מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיִּמְלֹ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and reigned שְׁתֵּים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַיַּעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> And he wrought הָרַע֙ <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD רַ֕ק <S%H7535><s%> but לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> like כְאָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> but not like his father וּכְאִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> and like his mother וַיָּ֙סַר֙ <S%H5493><s%> for he put away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַצְּבַ֣ת <S%H4676><s%> the image הַבַּ֔עַל <S%H1168><s%> of Baal אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> had made אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> that his father

רַ֠ק <S%H7535><s%> but בְּחַטֹּ֞אות <S%H2403><s%> unto the sins יָרָבְעָ֧ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְבָ֛ט <S%H5028><s%> of Nebat אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֶחֱטִ֥יא <S%H2398><s%> to sin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> which made Israel דָּבֵ֑ק <S%H1692><s%> Nevertheless he cleaved לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not סָ֖ר <S%H5493><s%> he departed מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <S%H4480><s%> at ס

וּמֵישַׁ֥ע <S%H4338><s%> And Mesha מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become נֹקֵ֑ד <S%H5349><s%> was a sheepmaster וְהֵשִׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> and rendered לְמֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאָה־ <S%H3967><s%> an hundred אֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand כָּרִ֔ים <S%H3733><s%> lambs וּמֵ֥אָה <S%H3967><s%> and an hundred אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אֵילִ֥ים <S%H352><s%> rams צָֽמֶר׃ <S%H6785><s%> with the wool

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּמ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> was dead אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> But it came to pass when Ahab וַיִּפְשַׁ֥ע <S%H6586><s%> rebelled מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> that the king מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab בְּמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> against the king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיֵּ֡לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> and sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יְהוֹשָׁפָ֨ט <S%H3092><s%> to Jehoshaphat מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king יְהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab פָּשַׁ֣ע <S%H6586><s%> hath rebelled בִּ֔י הֲתֵלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go אִתִּ֛י <S%H854><s%> for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> with me against Moab לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> to fight וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> saying אֶעֱלֶ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> I will go up כָּמ֧וֹנִי <S%H3644><s%> according to כָמ֛וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> you כְּעַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> I [am] as thou [art] my people כְעַמֶּ֖ךָ <S%H5971><s%> as thy people כְּסוּסַ֥י <S%H5483><s%> [and] my horses כְּסוּסֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5483><s%> as thy horses

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵי־ <S%H335><s%> how זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> he הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> Which way נַעֲלֶ֑ה <S%H5927><s%> shall we go up וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> ? And he answered דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> The way מִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> through the wilderness אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> of Edom

וַיֵּלֶךְ֩ <S%H1980><s%> went מֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> So the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמֶֽלֶך־ <S%H4428><s%> and the king יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom וַיָּסֹ֕בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> and they fetched a compass דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> journey שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> of seven יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days' וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become מַ֧יִם <S%H4325><s%> and there was no water לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֛ה <S%H4264><s%> for the host וְלַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> and for the cattle אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that בְּרַגְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H7272><s%> that followed

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲהָ֕הּ <S%H162><s%> Alas כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קָרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> together יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God לִשְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H7969><s%> these three הַמְּלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> kings הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to deliver אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab
